LanguageData.SSSW_SwitchWeaponsDesc: Switch between ranged, melee or unarmed weapons
LanguageData.SSSW_Melee: Melee: force using melee weapon (no effect without a melee weapon)
LanguageData.SSSW_LongRange: Long range: force using long range weapon
LanguageData.SSSW_MediumRange: Medium range: force using medium range weapon
LanguageData.SSSW_ShortRange: Short range: force using short range weapon
LanguageData.SSSW_Next: Next: switch to next weapon (if carrying multiple ranged or melee weapons)
LanguageData.SSSW_Previous: Previous: switch to previous weapon (if carrying multiple ranged or melee weapons)
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowAfterDraftToggleDesc: Will put the "Switch" gizmo after the "Draft/Undraft" gizmo
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowLongRangeSwitchDesc: Enable button for forcing pawns to use weapons with best DPS at long range
LanguageData.SSSW_LongRangeTargetDesc: Forcing "long range" usage will look for the weapon with the highest DPS at this range [default: 40]
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowMediumRangeSwitchDesc: Enable button for forcing pawns to use weapons with best DPS at medium range
LanguageData.SSSW_MediumRangeTargetDesc: Forcing "medium range" usage will look for the weapon with the highest DPS at this range [default: 25]
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowShortRangeSwitchDesc: Enable button for forcing pawns to use weapons with best DPS at short range
LanguageData.SSSW_ShortRangeTargetDesc: Forcing "short range" usage will look for the weapon with the highest DPS at this range [default: 12]
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowDangerousSwitchDesc: Enable button for forcing pawns to use dangerous weapons like grenades or rocket launchers
LanguageData.SSSW_ShowPrevNextSwitchDesc: Enable previous/next-buttons in UI which allow iterating through available weapons
LanguageData.SSSW_PrevNextSortByRangeDesc: Sorts weapons by range (and max. DPS if range is equal) when iterating via previous/next-buttons otherwise sorting goes by market value (similar to Simple Sidearms gizmo)
LanguageData.SSSW_PrevNextSkipDangerousDesc: Skips dangerous weapons when using previous/next-buttons if active (does not skip EMP weapons)
